entries.title: COP15: How China managed to get countries to agree
entries.description: China, which chaired the UN Biodiversity Conference held in Montreal (COP15), managed to reconcile diverging positions and have an ambitious agreement approved.

entries.title: Researchers are using MRI scans to better understand the minds of dogs
entries.description: Researchers are using MRI technology to scan dogs' brains. A pioneer in this research, the Lorand-Eötvös University laboratory in Budapest, Hungary has found that by studying the brains of man's best friend, they are able to uncover more about humans.
